headline.print_headline: Advisory Panel Urges F.D.A. to Re-examine Menthol in Cigarettes
headline.seo: F.D.A. Urged to Review Use of Menthol in Cigarettes
headline.main: Advisory Panel Urges F.D.A. to Re-examine Menthol in Cigarettes

docs.lead_paragraph: The scientific panel’s findings could provide a legal basis for the F.D.A. to try to limit, phase out or even possibly ban menthol in cigarettes.
docs.snippet: The scientific panel’s findings could provide a legal basis for the F.D.A. to try to limit, phase out or even possibly ban menthol in cigarettes.
